Le retour du démon
Akuma Kaiki
episode.summary: With Flare`s heroic arrival at the village, the odds are a bit evened, so it`s Lucy, Wendy, and Flare versus the three sexist treasure hunters of Sylph Labyrinth! Meanwhile, Natsu keeps following that mysterious voice, while Erza in child form gets a whupping from Minerva! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 退化ノ法
Art of Regression
La loi de la régression
Taika no Hou
episode.summary: Erza is confronted by Minerva, who doesn`t mind that her opponent is in a weakened child form. Now Minerva belongs to a dark guild, Succubus Eye, and her partner faces off against Natsu, who has also been reverted to childlike form. And Sun Village with its giant residents is still supernaturally frozen over... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔導士 vs. ハンター
Wizards vs. Hunters
Mages VS. chasseurs
Madoushi vs. Hunter
episode.summary: After arriving at the frozen Sun Village, the members of Fairy Tail try to figure out a way to defrost everything, but are interrupted by a trio of treasure hunters who may have the key to melting the otherwise indestructible ice... except they`re only interested in taking the village`s Eternal Flame for themselves. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編【序章】妖精対冥府
Tartaros Chapter, Prologue: Fairies vs. Netherworld
Fée VS Enfer
Tartaros Hen (Joshou): Yousei Tai Meifu
episode.summary: The battle between Laxus and Tempesta ends with all the members of the Raijinshuu lying near death. Natsu and all the other Fairy Tail members want to avenge them, but Tartaros`s whereabouts are unknown. Meanwhile, the demonic members of Tartaros begin to get intrigued with Fairy Tail... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編【序章】九鬼門
Tartaros Chapter, Prologue: The Nine Demon Gates
Les neuf portes démoniaques (Arc Tartaros, prologue)
Tartaros Hen (Joshou): Kyuu Kimon
episode.summary: The Magic Council is having a meeting about the mysteriously-disappearing dark guilds when they`re attacked by a powerful force, the harbinger of the Tartarus threat that will derail Fairy Tail`s recent relative peace and quiet. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Song of the Fairies
Song of the Fairies
Song of the fairies
Song of the Fairies
episode.summary: Natsu and the other Fairy Tail wizards help celebrate Flare`s homecoming in the defrosted Sun Village. Meanwhile, Minerva returns to the Succubus Eye guild, only to find a member of Tartarus waiting for her. Later, the Fairy Tail wizards make it back to Warrod`s house for rest, relaxation, and a revelation about his past! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎の声
Voice of the Flame
La voix de la flamme
Honoo no Koe
episode.summary: As Natsu battles the formidable winged cyclops monster, Gray enacts his plan to melt the mountain of ice encasing the Eternal Flame... but does he end up extinguishing that along with it? Plus: the identity of the familiar voice that called out to Natsu, bringing him to the frozen Eternal Flame! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 ジェラール vs. 六魔将軍[オラシオンセイス]
Tartaros Chapter: Jellal vs. Oracion Seis
Jellal VS. Oracion Seis
Tartaros Hen: Gerard vs. Oracion Seis
episode.summary: After breaking into the Tartaros stronghold, Natsu goes up against the foul Franmalth before getting an even chillier reception from another member! Meanwhile, the members of Oracion Seis are fighting for their freedom against Jellal, who tells them they`re still slaves to darkness! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 背徳と罪人
Tartaros Chapter: Immorality and Sinners
Immoralité et criminels
Tartaros Hen: Haitoku to Zainin
episode.summary: Erza and Mirajane visit Crawford, the former Magic Council chairman, and fall into Tartaros`s trap. And in exchange for information on Tartaros, Doranbolt frees all the members of Oracion Seis! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編【序章】ナツ vs. ジャッカル
Tartaros Chapter, Prologue: Natsu vs. Jackal
Natsu VS. Jackal
Tartaros Hen (Joshou): Natsu vs. Jackal
episode.summary: Natsu has a final showdown with Jackal, who turns himself into a human bomb at one point! Later, the other teams arrive too late, finding the other former members they`re meant to protect already murdered by Tartaros... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編【序章】白き遺産
Tartaros Chapter, Prologue: The White Legacy
L’héritage blanc
Tartaros Hen (Joshou): Shiroki Isan
episode.summary: Natsu foiled the initial attempt on Michello`s life, but now he has to battle Jackal, one of the Nine Demon Gates, to keep the former Magic Council member safe. It`s a hard fight, especially since Jackal has the power to make anything he touches (or that touches him) explode. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 ウェンディ vs. エゼル
Tartaros Chapter: Wendy vs. Ezel
Wendy vs. Ezel
Tartaros Hen: Wendy vs. Ezel
episode.summary: Franmalth uses the stolen power of Hades as he continues to battle Natsu and Lucy. Gray, Erza, and Mirajane are kept busy by other demons in the house, leaving Wendy and Carla as the only ones who can shut down Face, the weapon of mass magic destruction. Except the huge, multi-armed Ezel is waiting for them... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 生かすか殺すか
Tartaros Chapter: To Let Live or Die
Tuer ou laisser vivre
Tartaros Hen: Ikasu ka Korosu ka
episode.summary: The members of Fairy Tail are inside Tartaros`s Cube headquarters, but they`re too late to stop Face from being activated. The countdown is on, with less than an hour before all magic on the continent is nullified. Meanwhile, Zeref warns Natsu of a fateful choice he`ll have to make?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 悪魔転生
Tartaros Chapter: The Demon`s Rebirth
Réincarnation en démon
Tartaros Hen: Akuma Tensei
episode.summary: Cana engineers a clever way to get everyone out of Fairy Tail moments before the headquarters is blown apart in a massive explosion. Inside the Cube, Erza turns the tables on Kyoka, but how does Erza`s magic stand up against the power of Curses? And a sinister figure suddenly appears before the escaped Natsu... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 祈りが届く場所
Tartaros Chapter: A Place Reached by Prayer
Là où les prières arrivent
Tartaros Hen: Inori ga Todoku Basho
episode.summary: As Natsu and Lisanna plot their escape from the cell, Tartaros gains control of the magic weapon of mass destruction, Face. Levy tracks down the dark guild`s location and it`s closer than anyone expected, but before they can mount a rescue to save Natsu and the others, a mind-controlled Elfman activates a lacrima bomb at the guild! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 アレグリア
Tartaros Chapter: Alegria
Alegria (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Alegria
episode.summary: Just when Mirajane is about to succumb to Seilah`s Macro, she remembers a series of events in her childhood that could provide a clue to turning the tables on the Etherious demon. Then Mard Geer makes his move to neutralize all the Fairy Tail wizards and even scores of Tartaros soldiers on the Cube. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 冥王
Tartaros Chapter: Underworld King
Le roi des enfers (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Meiou
episode.summary: Jellal, Meldy, and Oracion Seis come across Rusty Rose, who tells them of his encounter with Tartaros after finding out the Dark Guild was preying on Dark sub-guilds. Later, Jellal and Meldy head off towards Tartaros, but someone doesn`t want them to go... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 ヘルズ・コア
Tartaros Chapter: Hell`s Core
Hell`s Core (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Hell`s Core
episode.summary: While Franmalth attempts to absorb Natsu and Lucy`s souls, Mirajane discovers the secret to the demons` immortality in Hell`s Core, right before Seilah unleashes the restraints on her own power to take on Mira. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 ずっと友達で
Tartaros Chapter: Friends Forever
Amies pour toujours
Tartaros Hen: Zutto Tomodachi de
episode.summary: Wendy has powered up for her showdown with Ezel, but in the end, she and Carla may have to make the ultimate sacrifice to stop Face from going off and obliterating magic all across the continent. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 星霊王 vs. 冥王
Tartaros Chapter: Celestial Spirit King vs. Underworld King
Roi des Esprits vs. Roi des Enfers (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Seireiou vs. Meiou
episode.summary: Lucy is a wreck after giving up Aquarius forever in exchange for a one-time summoning of the Celestial Spirit King, who then takes on Mard Geer, the Underworld King. And Lucy finds she doesn`t have time for tears as the explosive Jackal tries to take her out of the picture. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 星々の一撃
Tartaros Chapter: A Strike from the Stars
L`attaque stellaire (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Hoshiboshi no Ichigeki
episode.summary: All of the Fairy Tail members are flash-frozen, possibly dead, within the giant Tartaros prison called Plutogrim... except for Lucy, who seems to have escaped that fate through luck alone. But that luck seems to have run out as she`s pursued through the prison by the members of Tartaros, including the Nine Demon Gates! So it`s a good thing she can always count on her friends, the Celestial Spirits! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 グレイvs.シルバー
Tartaros Chapter: Gray vs. Silver
Grey vs. Silver (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Gray vs. Silver
episode.summary: The battle between Gray and Silver continues, although it`s an uphill one for the Fairy Tail members, as Silver is an Ice Devil Slayer and therefore immune to ice attacks. Meanwhile, Wendy comes up with a desperate plan to stop the 3,000 magic pulse bombs from going off in less than an hour! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 少年の物語
Tartaros Chapter: The Boy`s Tale
L`histoire d`un gamin (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Shounen no Monogatari
episode.summary: Gray is shocked to learn that Silver is his father. Meanwhile, Natsu and the others continue their battle against the other Nine Demon Gates, while Minerva has a change of heart and Happy gets a mushroom-ectomy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 エルザ vs. ミネルバ
Tartaros Chapter: Erza vs. Minerva
Erza vs. Minerva (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Erza vs. Minerva
episode.summary: Wendy and Carla successfully dismantled Face, only to find there are thousands more! And they find out what originally turned Minerva stone cold as she confronts Erza in the ruins of Tartaros HQ. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 銀色の想い
Tartaros Chapter: A Silver Wish
La transmission de Silver
Tartaros Hen: Gin`iro no Omoi
episode.summary: Gray knows the truth, that Silver really is his father! Juvia battles Keys, the puppet master of the dead. And petite mushroom Franmalth gives the Fairy Tail members the runaround so they can`t stop the 3,000 Face devices from going off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 絶望の翼
Tartaros Chapter: Wings of Despair
Les ailes du désespoir (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Zetsubou no Tsubasa
episode.summary: After more than seven years, out of nowhere, Fairy Tail`s worst nightmare returns: Acnologia, the dragon that nearly slaughtered the guild`s most powerful members. The timing couldn`t be worse, as the Fairy Tail members are exhausted, but then Natsu somehow hears Igneel`s voice... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 最後の一騎打ち
Tartaros Chapter: Final Duels
Le dernier duel (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Saigo no Ikkiuchi
episode.summary: It`s Laxus`s last stand against the immortal Tempester! Plus, Erza and company finally reach the control room, where the dead former Magic Council chairman is in the process of activating the 3,000 Face bombs. Kyoka and Seilah are also there, and quickly act to prevent the Fairy Tail members from interfering... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 鋼
Tartaros Chapter: Steel
Acier (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Hagane
episode.summary: Gajeel is trapped in Torafuzar`s toxic water. Even though his lungs are filled with air thanks to Levy, his body is quickly filling up with poison. And later, despite {\i1}his{\i0} body being filled with anti-magic particles, Laxus takes a last stand against the immortal Tempester. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 Air
Tartaros Chapter: Air
Air (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Air
episode.summary: Sting and Rogue continue their battle with Mard Geer, leader of Tartaros. Meanwhile, Erza and Minerva are still in the labyrinthine Cube, searching for the control room so they can stop the continent-wide magic pulse bomb detonation. And Torafuzar and Tempester turn into their ultimate Etherious forms to take on Dragon Slayers Natsu and Gajeel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 絶対の悪魔
Tartaros Chapter: Absolute Demon
Démon absolu (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Zettai no Akuma
episode.summary: Makarov may have a way to stop the threat of Face, but everyone`s memory of it will have to be wiped afterwards. Meanwhile, the battle in the sky between Igneel and Acnologia rages on while Gray, now a Devil Slayer, joins the fight on the ground against Mard Geer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 水晶の中の少女
Tartaros Chapter: The Girl in the Crystal
La fille dans le cristal (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Suishou no Naka no Shoujo
episode.summary: Natsu, Sting, and Rogue take on Mard Geer together while Igneel and Acnologia continue their battle overhead. Meanwhile, there`s still the problem of thousands of magic-decimating Face bombs set to go off, but Makarov has an ace up his sleeve... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 00:00
Tartaros Chapter: 00:00
00:00 (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: 00:00
episode.summary: The battle between Erza and Kyoka heats up as the demon uses her Curse power to make Erza and the other Fairy Tail members in the room ultra-sensitive to pain. And if that`s not bad enough, Kyoka steals all five of Erza`s senses! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 火竜の鉄拳
Tartaros Chapter: Fire Dragon Iron Fist
Poing d`acier du dragon de feu (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Karyuu no Tekken
episode.summary: Natsu interrupts the fiery battle between Igneel and Acnologia to ask his burning questions, but his former foster father gives him a task instead of answers: to steal the Book of END from Mard Geer. This prompts the leader of Tartaros to speed up Face`s timeline, by having Kyoka form a living link with the activation device. Only Erza can stop her, but will she prevail against Kyoka`s ultimate Etherious form? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 [終章] それが生きる力だ
Tartaros Chapter, Finale: Where the Power of Life Lies
La force de vivre (Épilogue de l`Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen (Shuushou): Sore ga Ikiru Chikara Da
episode.summary: In this epilogue to the Tartaros saga, the dragons reveal a tragic secret to Fairy Tail, while Natsu makes a vow to Igneel`s fading soul. In the aftermath, Makarov dissolves the guild, several members set out on their own quests, and Zeref drops a shocking revelation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 炎の雫
Tartaros Chapter: Drops of Fire
Gouttes de feu (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Honoo no Shizuku
episode.summary: It`s dragons to the rescue before the Face devices can siphon all magic from the continent. But even as one crisis is averted, there`s still the final battle between Igneel and Acnologia, as well as the reappearance of another well-nigh omnipotent foe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 イシュガルに舞う
Tartaros Chapter: Soaring Above Ishgar
Vol vers Ishgar (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Ishgar ni Mau
episode.summary: Gray survives Mard Geer`s ultimate Curse, revealing that his recent changes have left him not altogether human. Erza defeats Kyoka, but the demon has the last laugh as Face is activated. Almost immediately, the Fairy Tail members are sapped of strength as the Face units begin to siphon magic from all over the continent. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 メメント・モリ
Tartaros Chapter: Memento Mori
Memento Mori (Arc Tartaros)
Tartaros Hen: Memento Mori
episode.summary: Rogue and Sting have one last chance to take out their former, now demonically resurrected, master. Meanwhile, it`s hard enough for the tag team of Natsu and Gray to make any headway against Mard Geer`s ultimate form, but then the Underworld King unleashes his ultimate curse, Memento Mori! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 刃と踊る
Dancing with Blades
Danse avec la lame
Fairy Tail Zero: Yaiba to Odoru
episode.summary: After taking in the sights, sounds, and tastes of the port town of Halcyon, Mavis gets down to the business of searching for Blue Skull. She teams up with a reticent Precht and the two end up in a bar that`s more than it seems. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ トレジャーハント
Treasure Hunt
Chasse au trésor
Fairy Tail Zero: Treasure Hunt
episode.summary: As Mavis`s journey by sea continues, she explores an ancient underwater temple in an effort to find treasure that will fund the near-broke Yuri and Warrod. However, she inadvertently sets off a trap that seals all three of them inside with a giant deadly fish. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 冒険の始まり
The Adventure Begins
L`aventure commence
Fairy Tail Zero: Bouken no Hajimari
episode.summary: Mavis encounters treasure hunter Yuri Dreyar on Tenroujima and accepts his mind game challenge over the Tenrou Jade. This eventually leads to the beginning of a journey, but will Mavis`s oldest and only friend Zera agree to go? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 心の中の妖精
The Fairy in Your Heart
Des fées dans le cœur
Fairy Tail Zero: Kokoro no Naka no Yousei
episode.summary: Natsu and Happy make a pilgrimage to Tenroujima, site of Mavis Vermillion`s grave. This sets the stage for the origin story of Fairy Tail, with a six-year-old Mavis caught in the middle of a bloody war between two guilds on the island. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 宝物
Treasure
Trésor
Fairy Tail Zero: Takaramono
episode.summary: Mavis and the treasure hunters enlist the good people of Magnolia to stage an uprising against their tormentors, the evil wizards of Blue Skull. It also helps that they now have their own magic power with which to fight back. But what happens when their goal turns out to be much more than a lost treasure? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 魔道を伝える者
Conveyer of Magic
Le passeur de magie
Fairy Tail Zero: Madou o Tsutaeru Mono
episode.summary: While recuperating from their wounds in a forest, Mavis and her treasure hunter comrades encounter an enigmatic black magic wizard who is agreeable enough to teach them magic so they can get back at Blue Skull. However, not all of them are that adept at picking up such new skills... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 青い髑髏[ブルースカル]
Blue Skull
Blue Skull
Fairy Tail Zero: Blue Skull
episode.summary: Mavis and the treasure hunters explore the decrepit town of Magnolia, looking for answers. Soon enough, they learn of the town`s tragic fate and get involved in battle against the town`s magically armed and violent oppressors, Blue Skull! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 月明かりの湖
Moonlit Lake
Un lac au clair de lune
Fairy Tail Zero: Tsukiakari no Mizuumi
episode.summary: During the trek to Magnolia, Mavis and the treasure hunters find a chilling tableau in the woods. It reminds Yuri of an earlier treasure-hunting adventure in which the three of them braved Hell`s Valley to track down the Rainbow Flower. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎のメッセージ
Message of Flame
Message de feu
Honoo no Message
episode.summary: Reunited after a year, Natsu, Lucy, and Happy catch up on what has happened since, with Lucy informing the duo that Fairy Tail has been disbanded. Aiming to gather all their comrades once again, the trio heads out on a new adventure after Natsu raises the beacon of Fairy Tail`s revival.

episode.title: 挑戦者
Challenger
Challenger
Chousensha
episode.summary: One year after the dissolution of Fairy Tail, Lucy has become an editorial trainee for Weekly Sorcerer. On the final day of the latest Grand Magic Games, she spots a scandal and looks on with everyone else as a spoiler appears to disrupt the proceedings after the final match! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ 永遠の冒険
Eternal Adventure
L`aventure éternelle
Fairy Tail Zero: Eien no Bouken
episode.summary: Mavis says farewell to Zera and contemplates her next move after the successful defeat of Blue Skull. The heartbreaking, hopeful final episode of this arc marks the end of the beginning of Fairy Tail. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FAIRY TAIL ZERØ ロウ
Law
Law
Fairy Tail Zero: Law
episode.summary: Possessed by the Tenrou Jade and transformed into a dragon skeleton, Yuri runs amok through Magnolia. Only Mavis has a chance at saving him with a form of ancient ultra-magic, but it comes with a terrible price. Source: crunchyroll
